column4: Hi there, I'm with a realy weird problem of missing disk space! Anybopdy please?
>>>>>>>>> Hi there, I'm with a realy weird problem of missing disk space! Anybopdy please?
You asked that a few seconds ago. Don't ask again so soon. Why don't you try giving us more details instead?
Do you mean that you deleted something really large and then when you check System Monitor, you don't see a change in free space?
